name: Dit-tools.github.com
tagline: main page for the DIT-Tools community
body:
### Welcome to DIT-Tools community
  
We try to federate all project who can help you for DIT jobs.  
  
Based on watchdog, watchfolders to scan directories and auto-detect a new job.  
Launch these jobs on render managers like [DrQueue](https://github.com/DIT-Tools/drqueue) allow to set and change priorities.  
  
  
### Which Datas  
For jobs process you need to process video, image sequences, audio.  
All of these features are required to provide the helpful tool.  
  
see:  
[upipe](https://github.com/DIT-Tools/upipe)  
  
### Around all of that  
You also need commonly to parse EDL, AAF files.  
Find here some references to parsers:  
[Python EDL Parser](https://github.com/DIT-Tools/python-edl)  
[Python binding for AAF](https://github.com/DIT-Tools/pyaaf)  
[an EDL parser and editor](https://github.com/DIT-Tools/genericEDL)  

### Authors
Initialy created by  
[Marc-Antoine ARNAUD](http://marcantoine-arnaud.github.io/) - [Mikros Image](http://www.mikrosimage.eu/)  
Guillaume BOSSU - [Studio l'Equipe](http://www.studio-equipe.fr/)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
